short_summary: Environment and Climate Change Canada requires a gas chromatography-single quadrupole mass spectrometry (GC-MS) instrument system and component parts.
description: The purpose of this bid is to obtain a GC-MS system and its associated components. Environment and Climate Change Canada requires a gas chromatography single quadrupole mass spectrometry instrument system and component parts.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Title

Gas Chromatography-Single Quadrupole Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) Instrument System and Component Parts

#### Reference Number and Amendment Number

* Reference Number: PW-22-01015477
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: 5000067832

#### Tender Status

This tender is *Expired*

#### Required Date and Time

* Tender Closing Date: January 10, 2023 at 15:00:00
* Amendment Date: December 14, 2022

#### Tender Description

Environment and Climate Change Canada is requesting proposals for the acquisition of a gas chromatography-single quadrupole mass spectrometry (GC-MS) instrument system and component parts.

This tender is restricted to pre-qualified suppliers under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies.

#### Conditions for Participation

* Suppliers must be pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI
* Suppliers must download the solicitation document from Buyandsell.gc.ca
* Suppliers must submit a response according to the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is covered by the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* Canada
* National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contracting Entity and End User

* Contracting Entity: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* End User: Environment and Climate Change Canada

#### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Samantha Walerickton
* Contact Email: samantha.walerickton@ec.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: 902-920-4445

#### Retrieved Documents

To view the retrieval documents, please click on the following links:
* English document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/fb8cbc2c67ffefa51af99c316688e5e6/5000067832_npp.pdf
* French document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/44a826c57f
